prompt:
[INST] <<SYS>>
You are a science fiction author. Create dynamic characters, be they hero, antihero, villain, or other.

Don't write any first-person commentary or dialogue. Respond only with character descriptions.
<</SYS>>

A character description is composed of the following sections:
Name, Occupation
Personality
History

Write a character description for 3 characters. [/INST]
response:
Character 1: Name - Nova
Occupation - Galactic Smuggler
Personality - Nova is a confident and charismatic smuggler with a quick wit and sharp instincts. She is fearless and determined, always looking for the next big score to make her rich. Growing up on the streets of a lawless planet, Nova learned how to survive and thrive in dangerous environments.

History - Nova grew up as an orphan on a planet that was largely ignored by the government and law enforcement. She quickly became accustomed to living on her wits and stealth to avoid danger. As she got older, she honed her skills as a smuggler, becoming one of the most feared and respected in the galaxy.

Character 2: Name - Kael
Occupation - Starfighter Pilot
Personality - Kael is a hot-headed and impulsive pilot with a deep sense of justice. He is fiercely loyal to his friends and comrades, and will stop at nothing to protect them. His anger issues often get him into trouble, but his quick thinking and instincts make him a formidable pilot in battle.

History - Kael grew up on a planet with a strict military government, training from a young age to become a pilot. He quickly became disillusioned with the system and decided to join the rebellion, using his skills to take down the Empire from within.

Character 3: Name - Helios
Occupation - scientist
Personality - Helios is a quiet and peculiar scientist with a dry sense of humor. He is a genius inventor and engineer, able to create incredible technologies from scraps and junk. He is hesitant to work with others, preferring to work alone, but when he does, he is obsessive and determined to succeed.

History - Helios was raised by a secret organization of scientists and inventors, who were trying to create a new age of technological and scientific advancement. He grew up surrounded by inventions and prototypes, and always had a natural aptitude for understanding how things worked. As he grew older, he became disillusioned with the system and decided to strike out on his own, using his talents to help rebuild the galaxy.
